permissions.description: Set of permissions which should be applied.

create.description: Flag which indicates whether the create permission is granted.

read.description: Flag which indicates whether the read permission is granted.

update.description: Flag which indicates whether the update permission is granted.

delete.description: Flag which indicates whether the delete permission is granted.

publish.description: Flag which indicates whether the publish permission is granted.

readPublished.description: Flag which indicates whether the read published permission is granted.

recursive.description: Flag which indicates whether the permission update should be applied recursivly.
